text: Grue is a municipality in Innlandet county, Norway. In 2022, 4,548 people lived there. Settlements include, Aurbekkholen, Bekkola, Bergesida, Grinder, Kirkenær, Namnå, Risberget, Svullrya, and Tjura. == Related pages == * List of mayors in Norway that are elected until 2027 Category:Municipalities of Innlandet
title: Grue, Norway
